module.name: Languages
module.description: Adds the ability to changes the language within a call flow and add language attribute to users.
module.changelog: *2.5.0.1* r6123 inject macro-user-callerid with required language setting (was hardcoded) *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.3* #2843 Russian Translation, removal of un-needed code *2.4.0.2* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0.1* #2578 use setlanguage to handle changes in Asterisk 1.6 *2.4.0* First release of module
